text: Peter Tait (17 October 1936 – 18 July 1990) was an English professional footballer who played as a striker in the Football League for York City, and in non-League football for Scarborough, Bridlington Town, Goole Town, Dunnington and Bridlington Trinity. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Sportspeople from York Category:1990 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:York City F.C. players Category:Scarborough F.C. players Category:Bridlington Town A.F.C. players Category:Goole Town F.C. players Category:Bridlington Trinity F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Peter Tait (footballer)
